AboutPage.heroSubtitle: Connecting local brands with the people closest to their audience: authentic content creators.
AboutPage.storyP1: We started Collab after trying to manage influencer campaigns manually and discovering it consumes huge time with little effectiveness. The biggest challenge was reaching the right influencers and ensuring content quality and local compliance.
AboutPage.storyP2: So, we built a complete technical solution serving brands and creators locally, facilitating collaboration from A to Z, with full focus on the Saudi market and its specific needs.

values.winwinDesc: We strive to create an environment where the brand benefits from increased sales, and the influencer from increased income.

Privacy.title: Privacy Policy
Privacy.intro: At Collab, we are committed to protecting your privacy and personal data in accordance with the Personal Data Protection Law (PDPL) in Saudi Arabia. This policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your data.

collection.title: Data Collection
collection.content: We collect data necessary to provide our services, including:

items.usage: Usage data and interaction with the platform.

purpose.title: Purpose of Collection
purpose.content: We use your data to improve our services, manage your account, communicate with you, and ensure compliance with local regulations.

sharing.title: Data Sharing
sharing.content: We do not sell your data to third parties. We may share some data with trusted service providers (such as payment gateways) solely for the purpose of providing the service, and in accordance with applicable laws.

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.content: Under the law, you have the right to:

items.deletion: Request deletion of your personal data in certain cases.

security.title: Data Security
security.content: We take all necessary technical and organizational security measures to protect your data from unauthorized access, leakage, or damage.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at:

Terms.title: Terms & Conditions
Terms.intro: Welcome to Collab. These Terms & Conditions govern your use of our platform and constitute a binding contract between you and us in accordance with the E-Commerce Law in Saudi Arabia.

definitions.title: Definitions
definitions.content: 'Platform' refers to the Collab website and application. 'User' refers to anyone who creates an account or uses our services, whether a Brand or a Creator.

eligibility.title: Eligibility
eligibility.content: You must be at least 18 years old to use our services. Brands and Creators must obtain necessary licenses (such as 'Mawthooq' license) to operate legally.

services.title: Services
services.content: We provide a platform to connect Brands with Creators for influencer marketing campaigns. We are not a party to the direct contract between the Brand and the Creator, except to the extent of providing technical tools.

items.gcam: Comply with the regulations of the General Commission for Audiovisual Media (GCAM).
items.content: Not publish content that violates regulations or public morals.
items.accuracy: Provide accurate and correct information upon registration.

payment.title: Payments
payment.content: All financial transactions are processed through secure and licensed payment gateways. Fees and taxes apply in accordance with local regulations.

liability.title: Liability
liability.content: The Platform is not liable for any direct or indirect damages resulting from the use of the service or the contract between parties, except to the extent required by law.

governing.title: Governing Law
governing.content: These Terms & Conditions are governed by the laws and regulations of the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia, and Saudi courts shall have jurisdiction over any dispute arising therefrom.
